channel.title: machine learning on Jared Rosario
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Jared Rosario

item.title: CS 422 Notes 00
item.description: What is Machine Learning? By definition from Tom Mitchell: A computer program is learning form experience E w/ respect to some class of tasks T, and performance measure P, if its performance at tasks in T, as measured by P, improves w/ experience E. Breaking it down into simple terms… You improve over tasks T. Ex: Predicting the price of the house in the market. W/ repect to some performance P Ex: How much the house is sold for.
